Widget.name: Image
Widget.Description: This widget allows you to add an image on your page. You can link this image to a page if necessary.

Option.name: Image URL
Option.Description:
Specifies the URL of the image to display.
The URL can be:
  • relative (Example: /resources/logo/images/cvlogo_medium.png is rewritten to /mashup-ui/resources/logo/images/cvlogo_big.png)
  • or absolute (http://...).

Option.name: Image link
Option.Description: Specifies the page to access when you click on the image. If blank, no link is added.

Option.name: URL Target
Option.Description: Specifies where to open the page when clicking the link.

Option.name: Alternative text
Option.Description: Alternative text for semantic purpose and disabled people.

Option.name: Width
Option.Description:
Specifies the width of the image.
You must enter an integer.
If blank, the default image width is used.

Option.name: Height
Option.Description:
Specifies the height of the image.
You must enter an integer.
If blank, the default image height is used.
